name: SCNPhysicsContactDelegate
desc: Methods you can implement to respondÂ when a contact or collision occurs between two physics bodies in a scene.

items.name: func physicsWorld(SCNPhysicsWorld, didBegin: SCNPhysicsContact)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that two bodies have come into contact.

items.name: func physicsWorld(SCNPhysicsWorld, didUpdate: SCNPhysicsContact)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that new information is available about an ongoing contact.

items.name: func physicsWorld(SCNPhysicsWorld, didEnd: SCNPhysicsContact)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a contact has ended.
